Our properties for sale

New
LUXURY APARTMENT FOR SALE IN OSPEDALETTI
A few steps from the sea and the center of Ospedaletti, in the elegant "Regina Margherita" condominium, a three-room apartment of approximately 127 m2 located on the ground floor is for sale. The apartment faces south with sea view and is composed of: entrance, living room with large terrace and kitchen, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, as well as a staircase leading to the upper floor where there is a recreational area (or a third bedroom). The concierge service is active all day, the entrance to the area is equipped with an automatic gate, and the condominium is equipped with a park, swimming pool and parking spaces. The price includes a garage for one car of 20 m2 and a cellar of 8 m2.
3 Bedrooms
2 Baths
145 Mq
1 Parking space / Garage
Ref. 5665 € 900.000

Our residential rentals

New
VILLA FOR RENT 650 M2 IN BORDIGHERA
In Bordighera, a spacious villa of 650 m2 with a park of 3000 m2 and sea views is for rent within walking distance to the sea and the city center. The villa is located just 600 m from the sea in a quiet area. It consists of three floors and a separate house for the caretaker. The ground floor consists of: a living room with a fireplace, a dining room and a kitchen with access to the terrace, a toilet, a bedroom and a bathroom. First floor: 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms. Basement: living room with fireplace and access to the terrace, bar, wine cellar, two bedrooms, two bathrooms. House for the caretaker: living room with kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom. Individual heating, it is possible to make a swimming pool, there is a stream flowing through the villa. Garage and 5 parking spaces for cars. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the sea. The villa is rented for a long period of 6 or 12 months. Payment of rent is carried out in advance, if a contract for 6 months pays 6 months of rent at once (if a contract for 12 months pays 12 months of rent at once) + a deposit in case of damage to property in the house (one monthly payment). Costs for electricity, gas, water, garbage, gardener fees and pool maintenance are paid separately. Real estate agency fee 10% of the total rental amount.
3 Bedrooms
2 Baths
145 Mq
1 Parking space / Garage
Ref. 5665 € 900.000

Our seasonal rentals

New
FOUR-ROOM APARTMENT FOR SALE IN SANREMO
For sale four-room apartment on two levels in Sanremo on the first coast by the sea. The 139 m2 apartment is located on the second floor in a building with a lift and is composed of: entrance hall, large living room with panoramic sea view, kitchen with access to the balcony, bedroom and bathroom. From the entrance you go up the stairs to the second floor where there are two more bedrooms, a bathroom, a laundry room and a storage room. Independent heating, proximity to all city infrastructure.
